tool_description: Tiny and simple API used for reverse geocoding. Providing a pair of coordinates the endpoint responds with information about it.
name: RGeocode
title: RGeocode

api_list.name: Getlocationfromcoordinates
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rgeocode.p.rapidapi.com/georeverse/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rgeocode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rgeocode.p.rapidapi.com/georeverse/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rgeocode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
